name: Eye of the Beholder (itch)
description:
Jump into a journey controlling a small robot finding its way through old world ruins. Meet companions and solve puzzles on your way.

Inspiration:
Pillow Castle's First Person Puzzler
NieR Automata
The Witness

Art, visuals and models:
Jazmine Joao
Alexandra Li
Alexander Galloway
Dakota Freele

Code and game design:
Noxie

Music:
Anthony Seeha
